page.title: 08FARMING-MARKET GARDENING.
page.content: One of the top gardeners in Ashover is Mr Perkin. Mr Perkin lives next to the school. He mainly grows strawberries and raspberries and radishes. Nobody works for him but his wife helps him pick the plants and things.He has a stall on Chesterfield market where he sells these and other produce during the week.He does not water his plants often and he gets his manure from his milk man.He has got one large green house and does not have a lot of trouble from insects or pests.Mr Perkin goes to look at his plants every day depending on the weather. Mr Perkin says he started market gardening as his hobby when he was 9 or 10. He has not been on hoilday for a long time but when he does go on holiday his daughter looks after the garden.
